items.summary: This update improves the sync script by preventing unnecessary updates to the `pr-sync-state.json` file when no new PRs are found. The `_save_state()` function call has been removed when `new_items` is empty, reducing commit churn caused by timestamp-only updates. This change enhances the efficiency of the sync process.

items.title: Introducing a Quick Navigation Widget for the Roadmap in Roadmap ðŸš€
items.summary: We've added a floating quick navigation widget to enhance user experience on the roadmap page. This widget allows users to easily jump to major sections like Overview, Platform, and Q1-Q4 without scrolling. It appears only when users scroll to the 2026 Roadmap section, ensuring a clean interface with smooth transitions.

items.title: Enable Copilot PRs in daily updates sync in Roadmap ðŸš€
items.summary: This update allows Copilot-authored pull requests to bypass repository exclusion rules, ensuring they are recorded in daily updates. Key changes include the addition of a Copilot bypass detection mechanism and reordering of checks to access author information earlier. Regular user PRs will still be excluded from the Roadmap repository, maintaining clarity in updates.

items.title: Prevent Automatic Hash Navigation on Page Load in Roadmap ðŸš€
items.summary: This update resolves the issue of automatic navigation to `#2026-q4` upon page load. By implementing an `isInitialRender` flag, the hash is only updated when users manually interact with the details elements, ensuring a smoother user experience. The changes have been thoroughly tested and verified for functionality.

items.title: Resolved Juejin and X Publishing Issues in Publisher ðŸš€
items.summary: This update addresses critical issues with the Juejin and X publishing functionalities. Key modifications include enhancements to input handling in Playwright, improved focus management in the base publisher, and significant updates to the Juejin and X publisher classes for better content submission. These changes aim to streamline the publishing process and enhance user experience.

items.title: Enhance Image Upload Functionality in Platform Service ðŸš€
items.summary: This update introduces a new smart upload feature that automatically determines whether to handle images as Base64 or URLs, streamlining the upload process. Key modifications include enhancements to the core and utility files, improving the handling of image URLs and ensuring they are processed correctly before being sent to the CDN. These changes aim to enhance the overall efficiency and reliability of image uploads.
